Name: Herbheim's Mine
About the game: You play as a dwarf, the only warrior of the Herbheim clan. While your family work inside the mine your task is to defend the entrance. At first, everything seems fine, but as the night fall, the monsters come. Herbheim's mine is a hybrid game between tower defense and survival. You protect the entrance of a mine using resources found in the world or on enemies. Collect ressources : Using your trusty axe, chop down the forest's trees, collecting the rare ironwood used in trap crafting. Kill monsters and use their parts to enchant your weapons. Fight monsters : Every night the locales creature will try to invade the mine. Fight them first with sword, axe and bow and later with powerful traps, magic totems and automated ballista Upgrade your tools : Build a forge and create the more powerful tools
